TopicTitle: Any simple mod's for making the solar system bigger?

Articles.Content:
I would like to have mod that makes the solar system bigger in KSP that "WONT" require installing half of the KSP mod's to my computer like many of the mod's require in order to work . Just some simple mod that will only resize the planet's and their distances.

Edited January 17, 2016 by G3n3r4l
I mistaked RSS to rescale mod.

5 hours ago, G3n3r4l said:

I would like to have mod that makes the solar system bigger in KSP that "WONT" require installing half of the KSP mod's to my computer like many of the mod's require in order to work . Just some simple mod that will only resize the planet's and their distances.

Hyper edit?
Sigma made one, all you need is MM and Kopernicus, http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/126548-wip-sigma-dimensions/

AFAIK most alternate systems mods require only Kopernicus and Module Manager.

Anyway, there exists resizing mods with almost every size possible: x3, x6.4, x10 off the top of my head, probably a lot more that I don't remember.

Yep, hence my question. Heck, not even RSS requires installing a bunch of mods; you can play with regular parts and rockets and aero and whatever. You won't get high payload fractions, but you can do it. Or use SMURFF/ROMini.
